title: QuickText 4 Wear Lite
summary: Send texts / SMS:s from you wear device - easy and quick with QuickText4Wear
description: QuickText4Wear gives you the advantage of easily and quickly sending texts / SMS:s from you wear device without having to speak to you watch in public. Or if you native tongue isn't supported by Android Wear this is the text / SMS app for you.Set up a set of receivers and a set of predefined text messages on you mobile device and those are instantly synchronized with the wear device.On the wear device the app displays the receiver and the messages.---This version is limited to only two recipients. To get the full version, please upgrade to QuickText4Wear Pro
descriptionHTML:
QuickText4Wear gives you the advantage of easily and quickly sending texts / SMS:s from you wear device without having to speak to you watch in public.

Or if you native tongue isn't supported by Android Wear this is the text / SMS app for you.

Set up a set of receivers and a set of predefined text messages on you mobile device and those are instantly synchronized with the wear device.

On the wear device the app displays the receiver and the messages.

---

This version is limited to only two recipients. To get the full version, please upgrade to QuickText4Wear Pro
